ABv.caption: For a given text estimate the number of lines in the text by calculating the number of word wrapped lines between consecutive newline characters.
ABv.name: information

ABw.caption: Text
ABw.doc: Input text to estimate number of word wrapped lines
ABw.name: text

ABx.caption: Characters per Line
ABx.doc: Number of characters at which a line gets word wrapped. Leave empty to count only new lines.
ABx.name: characters
